channel.title: Acrylicx
channel.description:
Server is a 317 with Dodian features. Ever played a RSPS back in the day and cant find one like it anymore? We are what you're looking for. 100% ONLINE VPS HOSTED Featuring: Bandos Donator shops Donator zone new training areas fire giant working barrows all skills trainable highscores working jad lots of minigames website is here http://jonesscape2.no-ip.org/Acrylicx/index.html You can download the client here https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/100999202/Acrylicx%20Client.rar
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/w83o08.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/357m3pv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/3zdxu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2rqhatj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2wd1zxx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/24l0cqf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2qd7qcx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/v5xsna.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/15d5d21.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/a0h3iu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2d9xq8h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2qd7cye.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/23mo2hl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2m3l1xc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2w3vp8i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2el7ezb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/jha8et.png[/img]

item.title: Acrylicx
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Pictures may be small, but the server is fun. It reminds me of why I got into RSPS to begin with, and what really made me want to learn how to program… It’s great stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Acrylicx
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Got to love servers like this, will be online soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Acrylicx
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Soulcist:

Should probably try to fix the images, it’s a tad annoying and unprofessional.

Yes, the pictures are far too small I can barely make out what you’re trying to show us in the images. Again, all your “features” should already be in a server. Your “fire giant” isn’t really a feature all you’re doing is adding an npc in a location, hardly anything significant.

Read full topic
